problem_text:
Let f be a local screen of a formation which contains all finite nilpotent groups and let A be a group of automorphisms of a finite group G. Suppose that A acts f-stably on the socle of G/Φ(G). Is it true that A acts f-stably on Φ(G)?
L. A. Shemetkov
answer: No, not always (A. N. Skiba, Siber. Math. J., 34 (1993), 953–958).
